property.name: ServiceName
property.tp:docstring: The D-Bus service name providing this connection.

property.name: SpecificObject
property.tp:docstring: A specific object associated with the active connection.

property.name: SharedServiceName
property.tp:docstring: The D-Bus service name that provides a connection with which this active connection is shared.

property.name: SharedConnection
property.tp:docstring: The path of a connection provided by the D-Bus service SharedServiceName which which this connection is shared.

property.name: Devices
property.tp:docstring: Array of object paths representing devices which are part of this active connection.
